Non-linear Problem

class flatiron_tk.solver.non_linear_problem.NonLinearProblem(physics)[source]

Bases: NonlinearProblem

Non linear problem class for solving nonlinear PDEs using the dolfinx nonlinear solver. Supers the petsc.NonlinearProblem class.

Parameters:

  • physics

  • solved. (The physics object problem to be)
